#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i,l,d;
    string n,m;cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>d>>m;
        vector<char> v;
        l=m.length();
        for(i=0;i<l;i++)
        {
            if(m[i]=='4')
            {
                v.push_back('2');
                v.push_back('2');
                v.push_back('3');
            }
            else if(m[i]=='6')
            {
                v.push_back('3');
                v.push_back('5');
            }
            else if(m[i]=='8')
            {
                v.push_back('2');
                v.push_back('2');
                v.push_back('2');
                v.push_back('7');
            }
            else if(m[i]=='9')
            {
                v.push_back('2');
                v.push_back('3');
                v.push_back('3');
                v.push_back('7');
            }
            else if(m[i]>'1') v.push_back(m[i]);
        }
        sort(v.rbegin(),v.rend());
        for(i=0;i<v.size();i++)
            cout<<v[i];
        cout<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
